tooltip.aspect_of_the_jerry:
Right click ability: Parley
Channel your inner Jerry.
tooltip.rogue_sword:
Right click ability: Rogue Speed
Grants a speed boost for 30s.
tooltip.undead_sword: Deals double damage to undead mobs.
tooltip.end_sword: Deals double damage to End mobs.
tooltip.flaming_sword: Sets enemies on fire for 3 seconds.
